title: Sri Lankan’s new Finance Minister Ali Sabry resigns within 24 hours
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s newly appointed Finance Minister Ali Sabry, PC has resigned from his portfolio 24 hours after taking oaths in the presence of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
Sri Lankan’s new Finance Minister Ali Sabry resigns within 24 hours
Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa responsible for present crisis – Welgama
